name: Poker Chicken
description:
Poker Chicken is a casual poker-based puzzle game for everyone.

- Simple to play, but hard to master
- No betting or anything complicated
- Turn-based multiplayer option

The same deck of cards is dealt to both players, five cards at a time. After each hand, you and your opponent each choose to keep this hand or keep going. Should you stick with a safe pair, or risk going further into the deck? Try to get the best hand you can but don't run out of cards!
